citations.narrative:
The licensee is not following the Program of Vet Care for vaccinations. Of the 61 adult dogs, 24 are not up to date on all
three of the required vaccinations (distemper, parvovirus, and rabies). The due dates of the vaccinations range from
2022-2023. The current Program of Vet Care prescribes for the vaccinations to be performed yearly.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #9671 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #6543- there are no records this dog has received any vaccinations. Distemper, parvovirus, and
rabies vaccinations are all due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #6641 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #6642 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #6643 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #7005 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult female (F) Poodle #7049 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 12/10/21. Booster vaccination was
due 12/10/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 12/19/21. Booster vaccination was due on 12/19/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7044 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 12/10/21. Booster vaccination was
due 12/10/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7045 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 12/10/21. Booster vaccination was
due 12/10/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7046 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 12/10/21. Booster vaccination was
due 12/10/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7048 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 12/10/21. Booster vaccination was
due 12/10/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult male (M) Yorkie #7002 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Poodle #6104 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Maltese #7004 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult female (F) Poodle #7020 last received a rabies vaccination on 9/10/21. Booster vaccination was due on 9/10/22.
The distemper and parvovirus vaccinations are up to date.
- Adult male (M) Shih Tzu #7001 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is
no record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7011 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 4/8/22. Booster vaccination was
due 4/8/23. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7012 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 4/8/22. Booster vaccination was
due 4/8/23. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7008 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 5/4/21. Booster vaccination was
due 5/4/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 7/22/21. Booster vaccination was due on 7/22/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #7014 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 5/4/21. Booster vaccination was
due 5/4/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 12/19/21. Booster vaccination was due on 12/19/22.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #8548 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on 11/26/21. Booster vaccination was
due 11/26/22. Rabies vaccination is up to date.
- Adult female (F) Shih Tzu #8549 was last vaccinated for distemper and parvovirus on1/19/21. Booster vaccination was
due 1/19/22. Rabies vaccination was last administered on 9/10/21. Booster vaccination was due on 9/10/22.
- Adult male (M) Yorkie #2086 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
- Adult male (M) Yorkie #2087 was last vaccinated for rabies on 4/4/22. Booster vaccination was due 4/4/23. There is no
record this dog has received a distemper and parvovirus vaccine. The distemper and parvovirus vaccines are due.
Distemper, parvovirus, and rabies are potentially life-threatening diseases to dogs and, if contracted, may cause pain,
distress, and suffering. It is also important for breeding females to be vaccinated as they will pass immunity to their
offspring through their milk. Correct by vaccinating for distemper, parvovirus, and rabies in accordance with a schedule
approved by the Attending Veterinarian and vaccine manufacturer recommendations. Correct by: August 9, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs.

three of the required vaccinations (distemper, parvovirus, and rabies). The due dates of the vaccinations range from
